mapper.select: select * from activities where club_id = #{club_id} and DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL #{time} DAY) <= date(start_time)
select a.* from activities a inner join participate p on a.activity_id = p.activity_id where CURRENT_TIME <= a.start_time and CURRENT_TIME >= a.close_time and p.user_id = #{user_id};
select a.* from activities a inner join participate p on a.activity_id = p.activity_id where CURRENT_TIME <= a.end_time and CURRENT_TIME >= a.start_time and p.user_id = #{user_id};
mapper.insert: INSERT ignore INTO activities (club_id, organizer_id,name,introduction ,start_time,end_time,close_time,favicon,privilege,notes) VALUES (#{clubId},#{organizerId},#{name},#{introduction},#{startTime},#{endTime},#{closeTime},#{favicon},#{privilege},#{notes})
